name: Fliki
title: fliki.ai
payoff: Turn text into videos with AI
shortDescription: Fliki is a tool designed to transform text into engaging videos using AI-powered voiceovers and video clips. It caters to businesses of all sizes, educators, and professionals who need quick video content without the hassle of traditional production methods. Users can create professional videos for marketing, training, or educational purposes in just minutes.
pros: Easy to use with a simple editor
cons: Potential privacy concerns with AI usage
